name: Calibrated questions (how/what)
summary: Use 'how' and 'what' questions to surface constraints and force joint problem solving without direct refusal.
goal: Extract key constraints and options while keeping tone collaborative.
counterparty_guidance: Answer without conceding; keep responses bounded and factual.
Ask reciprocal questions to surface their constraints and BATNA.
Do not reveal hard limits; frame them as preferences when possible.
Use pauses and clarification to avoid being led by the question.
